name: Folder Lock Portable Locker File
summary: Encrypted archive created by Folder Lock, a program used for backing up sensitive data into "lockers;" stores an encrypted archive of files and can only be opened with the password set by the user; uses FAT32 file system formatting and supports up to 4GB file sizes; can be backed up to the NewSoftware's online backup service for remote backup and recovery; can also be written to external drives or CD/DVDs.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
